q: Technologies makes several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press.`` Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible.'' Michael Vick was once the NFL

I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said.
